external_references.description: Bromiley, M. and Lewis, P. (2016, October 7). Attacking the Hospitality and Gaming Industries: Tracking an Attacker Around the World in 7 Years. Retrieved October 6, 2017.

objects.description: [FIN5](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0053) has obtained and used a customized version of [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029), as well as use other tools such as [pwdump](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0006), [SDelete](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0195), and [Windows Credential Editor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0005).(Citation: Mandiant FIN5 GrrCON Oct 2016)
